titleStmt.title: A heauenly voyce A sermon tending to call the people of God from among the Romish Babylonians: preached at Paules Crosse the 12 of Ianuarie. 1606. By William Symonds.
titleStmt.author: Symonds, William, 1556-1616?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ames] R[oberts] for Edmund VVeauer, and are to be solde at his shoppe, at the great north-doore of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 23591a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Leaf C2 stained; some print show-through.

place.placeName: his shoppe, at the great north-doore of Paules Church
